title: TotalEnergies to Make $444 million Investment in JV with Adani Green
description: The JV company will house a 1,150 mw portfolio, which will comprise a mix of operational and under-execution solar assets with a blend of both merchant-based and power purchase agreement-based projects, said a company statement.
